mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation ( rno , pcode , maskCnt , approval , amount , regId , regDt , modId , modDt ) VALUES ( TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMMDD')||'_'||RESERV_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{pcode, jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{maskCnt} , #{approval, jdbcType = VARCHAR} , #{amount} , #{regId, jdbcType = VARCHAR} , SYSDATE , #{modId, jdbcType = VARCHAR} , SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT t1.rNo, t1.approval, t1.amount, t2.email, t2.name, t2.tel, t2.addr, t2.zipno FROM reservation t1, member t2 WHERE t1.rNo = #{rNo, jdbcType = VARCHAR} AND t1.regId = t2.email
